entities.name: grawp
entities.description: GRAWP is mentioned as a place where Harry and his friends were standing around in the weak May sunshine.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story. He is being nagged by Hermione about not going back to Snape for Occlumency lessons.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another main character in the story. She is nagging Harry about not going back to Snape for Occlumency lessons.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a main character in the story. He snorts disbelievingly when Hermione says she wasn't going to say anything about Fred and George.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Fred and George are twins who have spent a good bit of the gold they won. Harry doesn't want to get it back from them.

relationships.description: Hermione is nagging Harry about not going back to Snape for Occlumency lessons.
Harry owes money to Fred and George, who have spent a good bit of the gold they won.
